news: [Roadmap] Upgrade to Java 8, MySQL injection with BIGINT and overflow, MS-Access database, WAF tamper, Bruteforce of HTTP Auth, Arabic translation, Command line interface.

[Feature] Help the community and translate jSQL into your language. Click on the top right button to show the advanced settings and open menu Community, choose a language using 'I help translate jSQL' and translate some text then click on Send. Your translation will be integrated to the next release by the developer.
[In progress] Translation to Chinese completed, French 65%, Russian 54%, Czech 20%, Arabic 8%, thanks to the community. Also GUI compatibility with Right To Left languages like Arabic.
[Programming] Contact the developer for any help with Burp integration, CTF events and custom builds.
